se.fredin.gravitation.entity.physical

Class LaunchPad

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.fredin.gravitation.entity.AbstractEntity
      • se.fredin.gravitation.entity.physical.PhysicalEntity
        • se.fredin.gravitation.entity.physical.LaunchPad
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, Entity

    public class LaunchPad
extends PhysicalEntity
    Launchpad class creates a launchpad in which the player will spawn. Launchpad is a physical box2D entity and will interact with the player.
    Author:
    Johan Fredin

    • Constructor Detail

      • LaunchPad

        public LaunchPad(float xPos,
         float yPos,
         java.lang.String texturePath,
         com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
         float bodyWidth,
         float bodyHeight)
        Creates a new LaunchPad. Gives it a position, width and height, a sprite and gives it to a box2D world.
        Parameters:
        xPos - The x position of the launchpad.
        yPos - The y position of the launchpad.
        texturePath - The path of the texture used for the sprite.
        world - The box2D world to give the physical entity to.
        bodyWidth - The width of the launchpad.
        bodyHeight - The height of the launchpad.

      • checkIfTaken

        public void checkIfTaken(Player player1,
                Player player2,
                float delta)
        Check if a player is currently positioned on the launchpad.
        Parameters:
        player1 - The first player that might be positioned on the launchpad.
        player2 - The second player that might be positioned on the launchpad.
        delta - The time interval since last render occurred.
